embed: <object width="425" height="344"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/tYk4_Nzl-Gg?version=3&f=videos&app=youtube_gdata"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/tYk4_Nzl-Gg?version=3&f=videos&app=youtube_gdata" allowscriptaccess="always" height="344" width="425" allowfullscreen="true" type="application/x-shockwave-flash"></embed></object>
summary:
In this talk we learn how to throw together a distributed system using gevent
and a simple framework called gservice. We'll go from nothing to a distributed
messaging system ready for production deployment based on experiences building
scalable, distributed systems at Twilio.
title: Throwing Together Distributed Services With Gevent
